code: import React from"react";import"./css/GalleryGrid.css";import{motion}from"framer-motion";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GalleryGrid=_ref=>{let{images}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gallery-grid container my-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row g-4",children:images.map((img,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 col-sm-6 col-md-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"gallery-card position-relative overflow-hidden rounded-4 shadow-sm",initial:{opacity:0,y:30},whileInView:{opacity:1,y:0},viewport:{once:true},transition:{duration:0.4,delay:index*0.05},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img.url,alt:img.category,className:"img-fluid gallery-image",style:{width:"100%",height:"300px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gallery-overlay position-absolute top-0 start-0 w-100 h-100 d-flex flex-column justify-content-end p-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"text-white fw-bold mb-1",children:img.title||"Untitled"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-warning small mb-0",children:img.category})]})]})},index))})});};export default GalleryGrid;
